# Jamaica Developer Kit — Complete API Reference

> This file contains the complete API documentation for the Jamaica Developer Kit.
> It is designed for consumption by AI coding assistants and LLMs.
> For interactive documentation, visit https://jamaica-dev.org

## Installation

```bash
# Install everything
npm install jamaica        # TypeScript/JavaScript
pip install jamaica        # Python

# Or install individual packages
npm install jamaica-trn jamaica-phone jamaica-currency
pip install jamaica-trn jamaica-phone jamaica-currency

# CLI
npm install -g jamaica-cli
```

## Import Patterns

```typescript
// Meta-package — flat imports (most common)
import { formatTRN, formatJMD, calculatePayroll } from 'jamaica';

// Meta-package — namespaced (avoids collisions)
import { trn, currency, tax } from 'jamaica';
trn.formatTRN('123456784');
currency.formatJMD(5000);

// Meta-package — sub-path (tree-shakeable)
import { formatTRN } from 'jamaica/trn';
import { formatJMD } from 'jamaica/currency';

// Individual packages (smallest bundle)
import { formatTRN } from 'jamaica-trn';
import { formatJMD } from 'jamaica-currency';
```

```python
# Meta-package — flat imports
from jamaica import format_trn, format_jmd, calculate_payroll

# Meta-package — namespaced
from jamaica import trn, currency, tax
trn.format_trn("123456784")
currency.format_jmd(5000)

# Individual packages
from jamaica_trn import format_trn
from jamaica_currency import format_jmd
```

---

## jamaica-trn — TRN Validation

Jamaica Taxpayer Registration Number: 9 digits with mod-11 check digit. Format: XXX-XXX-XXD

```typescript
// TypeScript
import { isValidTRN, formatTRN, unformatTRN, generateTestTRN, getTRNCheckDigit } from 'jamaica-trn';

isValidTRN('123-456-784')     // true (valid check digit)
isValidTRN('123-456-789')     // false (invalid check digit)
formatTRN('123456784')        // '123-456-784'
unformatTRN('123-456-784')    // '123456784'
generateTestTRN()             // Random valid TRN for testing
getTRNCheckDigit('12345678')  // 4
```

```python
# Python
from jamaica_trn import is_valid_trn, format_trn, unformat_trn, generate_test_trn

is_valid_trn("123-456-784")   # True
format_trn("123456784")       # "123-456-784"
```

---

## jamaica-phone — Phone Number Validation

Jamaica uses area codes +1-876 and +1-658. 10-digit numbers (area code + 7 digits).

```typescript
import { isValidJamaicanNumber, parsePhone, formatNational, formatE164, getCarrier, isMobile } from 'jamaica-phone';

isValidJamaicanNumber('8765551234')    // true
isValidJamaicanNumber('+18765551234')  // true
formatNational('8765551234')           // '(876) 555-1234'
formatE164('8765551234')               // '+18765551234'

const parsed = parsePhone('8765551234');
// { areaCode: '876', subscriberNumber: '5551234', ... }

// NOTE: getCarrier() and isMobile() are unreliable since Jamaica
// introduced number portability in May 2015.
```

```python
from jamaica_phone import is_valid_jamaican_number, format_national, format_e164

is_valid_jamaican_number("8765551234")  # True
format_national("8765551234")           # "(876) 555-1234"
```

---

## jamaica-currency — JMD Formatting & GCT

```typescript
import { formatJMD, parseJMD, addGCT, removeGCT, formatWithGCT, jmdToUSD, usdToJMD, GCT_RATE } from 'jamaica-currency';

formatJMD(5000)              // 'J$5,000.00'
formatJMD(5000, { decimals: 0 })  // 'J$5,000'
parseJMD('J$5,000.00')      // 5000

// GCT (General Consumption Tax) = 15%
addGCT(1000)                 // 1150
removeGCT(1150)              // 1000
formatWithGCT(1000)          // { subtotal: 1000, gct: 150, total: 1150 }

// Currency conversion (uses default rate — fetch live rates for production)
jmdToUSD(15000)              // ~96.54 (at default rate)
usdToJMD(100)                // ~15547 (at default rate)
```

---

## jamaica-tax — Payroll & Income Tax

```typescript
import { calculatePayroll, calculateIncomeTax, getIncomeTaxBrackets, ANNUAL_THRESHOLD } from 'jamaica-tax';

// Full payroll for J$200,000 monthly gross
const payroll = calculatePayroll(200_000);
// {
//   period: 'monthly',
//   grossPay: 200000,
//   incomeTax: ...,        // PAYE
//   nis: ...,              // 3% (capped at J$5M/year)
//   nht: ...,              // 2%
//   educationTax: ...,     // 2.25%
//   totalDeductions: ...,
//   netPay: ...,
//   employerNIS: ...,      // 3%
//   employerNHT: ...,      // 3%
//   employerEducationTax: ...,  // 3.5%
//   employerHEART: ...,    // 3%
//   totalEmployerContributions: ...,
//   totalCostToEmployer: ...
// }

// Income tax only
const tax = calculateIncomeTax(3_000_000);
// { annualIncome, threshold: 1500096, taxableIncome, tax, effectiveRate, brackets: [...] }

// Tax threshold
ANNUAL_THRESHOLD  // 1500096 (J$1,500,096/year)

// Periods: 'monthly' (default), 'fortnightly', 'weekly', 'annual'
calculatePayroll(50_000, 'weekly');
```

---

## jamaica-parishes — Parish Data

```typescript
import { getAllParishes, getParish, getDistanceKm } from 'jamaica-parishes';

const parishes = getAllParishes();  // 14 parishes
// [{ name: 'Kingston', code: 'KIN', capital: 'Kingston', population: 89057, area: 25, coordinates: {...}, ... }]

const kingston = getParish('KIN');
// { name: 'Kingston', code: 'KIN', capital: 'Kingston', population: 89057, ... }

// Distance between parish capitals (Haversine)
getDistanceKm('KIN', 'MOB');  // ~154 km (Kingston to Montego Bay)
```

---

## jamaica-gov-fees — Government Service Fees

```typescript
import { searchFees, getPassportFee, getVehicleRegistrationFee, getAllFees, getAgencies } from 'jamaica-gov-fees';

// Search all fees
const results = searchFees('passport');  // All passport-related fees

// Specific lookups
getPassportFee('adult', 'standard');   // { jmd: ..., usd: ... }
getVehicleRegistrationFee(1600);       // Fee for 1600cc engine
getAgencies();                         // 10 government agencies
getAllFees();                          // All 60+ fees
```

---

## jamaica-holidays — Public Holidays & Business Days

```typescript
import { getHolidays, isPublicHoliday, isBusinessDay, getWorkingDays, getNextHoliday } from 'jamaica-holidays';

getHolidays(2025);               // 10 holidays for 2025
isPublicHoliday('2025-12-25');   // true (Christmas Day)
isBusinessDay('2025-01-01');     // false (New Year's Day)
isBusinessDay('2025-01-02');     // true (regular Thursday)

// Working days between two dates
getWorkingDays('2025-01-01', '2025-01-31');  // excludes weekends & holidays

// Next upcoming holiday
getNextHoliday('2025-06-01');  // { date: '2025-08-01', name: "Emancipation Day" }

// Sunday substitution: if a holiday falls on Sunday, Monday is observed
// Example: Christmas 2022 was Sunday → Dec 26 observed, Boxing Day → Dec 27
```

---

## jamaica-addresses — Address Parsing

```typescript
import { parseAddress, formatAddress, extractParish, isKingstonAddress } from 'jamaica-addresses';

const parsed = parseAddress('123 Main Street, Kingston 10');
// { streetNumber: '123', streetName: 'Main Street', parish: 'Kingston', kingstonSector: 10, ... }

formatAddress(parsed);  // '123 Main Street, Kingston 10'
extractParish('somewhere in St. Andrew');  // 'St. Andrew'
isKingstonAddress('Kingston 5');  // true
```

---

## jamaica-schools — School Directory

```typescript
import { getSchools, getUniversities, searchSchools, getSchoolsByParish } from 'jamaica-schools';

getSchools();                          // 70+ schools
getUniversities();                     // UWI, UTech, NCU, CMU, Mico, etc.
searchSchools('Kingston');             // Schools with "Kingston" in name
getSchoolsByParish('St. Andrew');      // Schools in St. Andrew
getSchoolsByType('secondary');         // All secondary schools
```

---

## jamaica-health — Health Facilities

```typescript
import { getHospitals, getRegionalAuthority, getNearestFacility } from 'jamaica-health';

getHospitals();                        // 22 hospitals with GPS coordinates
getRegionalAuthority('Manchester');    // { id: 'srha', name: 'Southern RHA', ... }
getNearestFacility(18.0, -76.8);      // Nearest facility to coordinates
getNearestFacility(18.0, -76.8, 'hospital');  // Nearest hospital only
```

---

## jamaica-banks — Banking Directory

```typescript
import { getBanks, getSwiftCode, getBankBranches } from 'jamaica-banks';

getBanks();                // 14 institutions (NCB, Scotiabank, JMMB, JN, etc.)
getSwiftCode('ncb');       // 'JABORJMK'
getBankBranches('ncb');    // 10 NCB branches with addresses
```

---

## jamaica-constituencies — Electoral Constituencies

```typescript
import { getConstituencies, getConstituencyByParish } from 'jamaica-constituencies';

getConstituencies();                      // All 63 constituencies
getConstituencyByParish('St. Andrew');    // 12 constituencies in St. Andrew
```

---

## jamaica-transport — Transport Infrastructure

```typescript
import { getAirport, getAirports, getRoadNetwork, getVehicleClasses } from 'jamaica-transport';

getAirport('KIN');      // Norman Manley International (IATA: KIN, ICAO: MKJP)
getAirport('MBJ');      // Sangster International
getRoadNetwork();       // { totalKm: 22121, pavedKm: 15462, ... }
getVehicleClasses();    // 10 vehicle classifications
```

---

## jamaica-emergency — Emergency Services

```typescript
import { getEmergencyNumbers, getPoliceStations, getDisasterShelters } from 'jamaica-emergency';

getEmergencyNumbers();  // { police: '119', ambulance: '110', fire: '110', disasterPreparedness: '116' }
getPoliceStations();    // 23 stations across all parishes
getDisasterShelters();  // 17 hurricane shelters
```

---

## jamaica-places — Places Directory

```typescript
import { searchPlaces, getTowns, getPlacesByParish } from 'jamaica-places';

searchPlaces('Montego');           // [{ name: 'Montego Bay', type: 'town', parish: 'St. James', ... }]
getTowns();                        // All major towns and cities
getPlacesByParish('St. Ann');      // All places in St. Ann
```

---

## jamaica-constants — Country Reference Data

```typescript
import { COUNTRY_CODE, CALLING_CODE, EMERGENCY_NUMBER, TIMEZONE, FLAG_COLORS } from 'jamaica-constants';

COUNTRY_CODE         // 'JM'
CALLING_CODE         // '+1'
EMERGENCY_NUMBER     // '119'
TIMEZONE             // 'America/Jamaica'
FLAG_COLORS          // { green: '#009B3A', gold: '#FED100', black: '#000000' }
```

---

## CLI Usage

```bash
# Install globally
npm install -g jamaica-cli

# TRN
jamaica trn validate 123-456-784
jamaica trn format 123456784

# Phone
jamaica phone validate 8765551234
jamaica phone format 8765551234

# Currency
jamaica currency format 5000
jamaica currency gct 1000

# Tax / Payroll
jamaica tax payroll 200000
jamaica tax income 3000000
jamaica tax brackets

# Fees
jamaica fees search passport

# Holidays
jamaica holidays list 2025
jamaica holidays check 2025-12-25

# Schools
jamaica schools list --parish "St. Andrew"
jamaica schools universities

# Health
jamaica health hospitals
jamaica health rha

# Banks
jamaica banks list
jamaica banks swift ncb

# Transport
jamaica transport airports
jamaica transport airport KIN

# Emergency
jamaica emergency numbers
jamaica emergency police

# Places
jamaica places towns
jamaica places search "Montego Bay"

# Constituencies
jamaica constituencies list
jamaica constituencies count

# All commands support --json flag
jamaica tax payroll 200000 --json
```
